name: Mega Games 6
overview: Mega Games 6 is a compilation of six Sega Mega Drive games, distributed with some European Mega Drive II consoles in 1995. It is actually a combination of two previous pack-in games, Mega Games 1 and Mega Games 2. It would be followed by Mega Games 6 Vol. 2 and Mega Games 6 Vol. 3. Games included: Columns Golden Axe Super Hang-On Streets of Rage The Revenge of Shinobi World Cup Italia '90
